_header: What way didest thou wink when thou a wife took
_description: The Trials of Marriage — two couplets

BodEngPoete1.Transcription:
What why dedist þou wynk whan þou a wyf tokeþou
                    haddest ueuer mor ned brodde to lokea man þat wedyth a wyfe whan he
                    wynkythBut he star afterward wonder me thynkyth
